title: How to Install Access Truck Bed LED Lights
description: Installing Access LED Lights in your truck requires just a few basic hand tools including a multi-meter and electrical tape.
tags: Access Truck Bed LED Lights, Truck Bed Lights, LED Lights, Truck Bed Lighting

asset.title: How to Install Access Truck Bed LED Lights
asset.description:
Buy Here: http://www.autoanything.com/hitch-bed-accessories/69A5623A0A0.aspx

See how easy it is to install Access Truck Bed LED lights in your rig with a few basic hand tools. The key here is hooking these lights to a readily available 12 volt power source and in most cases, this will be your truck's taillight harness. Once connected, you can stick the LED lights to the inside of your bed using the sturdy, 3M tape that's attached to their backs. And just like that, you have plenty of light to illuminate even the darkest beds.   

See more by accessories from Access here: http://www.autoanything.com/brands/102A298.aspx

Shop our entire selection of LED tonneau cover lighting here: http://www.autoanything.com/shop/tonneau-light
asset.author: AutoAnything
